          <title>
            <string language="hu">A tengeri saláta</string>
            <string language="en">The green laver</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der grüne Purpurtang</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le varech vert</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O laver verde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'ulva verde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το πράσινο ροδοφύκος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El varec verde</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Lemezes telepű zöldmoszat - tengeri saláta</string>
            <string language="en"> alga in sheet colony - green laver</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">zöldmoszat,  lemezes telep,  telepes növények,  szimbiózis,  </string>
            <string language="en">alga, sheet colony, thalloid plants, symbiosis</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de"> Alge in der Blattkolonie - grüner Purpurtang</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr"> algue dans la colonie de feuille - varech vert</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt"> alga na colônia da folha - laver verde</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it"> alga nella colonia del foglio - ulva verde</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el"> άλγη στην αποικία φύλλων - πράσινο ροδοφύκος</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es"> alga en la colonia de la hoja - varec verde</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alge, Blattkolonie, thalloid Betriebe, Symbiose</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">algue, colonie de feuille, usines de thalloid, 
symbiose</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">alga, colônia da folha, plantas do thalloid, symbiosis</string>
          </keyword>

simbiosi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άλγη, αποικία φύλλων, εγκαταστάσεις thalloid, συμβίωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">alga, colonia de la hoja, plantas del thalloid, 
simbiosis</string>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
